text:
August 6, 1956
Mr, Seymour N, Siegel
Director, Radio Station WNYC
2>00 Municipal Building
New York 7, New York
Dear Sy:
I’ve read the draft of the Appendix to the Prix Italia, for Television entries#
I see no objections. But since I’m leaving today for Alabama and won’t be in
much before about September 6, I’ve made a couple of marginal notes and passed
on to Schooley, in case anything occurs to him, if he has more time than I do
today. If so you’ll hear from him direct.
Details! l) two iaillian(s) lire (p,l)
2) I assume (p,2) only NAEB member ETV Stations could broadcast under
Article 6c?
Article 10 s Only NAEB is involved from the U* S, Right?
I assume the Organization can distribute prize money (Article 19)
as it sees fit.
Looks carefully and fairly done. Hope we can hit it sometime.
Our best,
\
HJSidfc
Harry J, Skoraia
Executive Director
